mapper.select: SELECT acct_code as acctCode, name as aname FROM account WHERE com_id = #{comId} AND acct_yn = 'Y' AND (acct_code LIKE #{keyword} || '%' OR name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY acct_code

SELECT SUBSTR(sub_code, -2) AS iType, sub_name AS iName FROM subcodes WHERE com_id = #{comId} AND main_code = 'itp' AND (sub_code LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR sub_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY sub_code

SELECT SUBSTR(sub_code, -2) AS tType, sub_name AS tName FROM subcodes WHERE com_id = #{comId} AND main_code = 'cht' AND (sub_code LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR sub_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY sub_code

SELECT rule_id, (SELECT sub_name FROM subcodes WHERE sub_code = r.chit_type) chitType, (SELECT sub_name FROM subcodes WHERE sub_code = r.itp_type) itpType, (SELECT name FROM account a WHERE a.acct_code = r.acct_code) acctCode, vat_yn, com_id, created_date, update_date FROM auto_chit_rule r WHERE com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY chit_type, itp_type
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO auto_chit_rule r USING ( SELECT #{ruleId} AS rule_id, #{chitType} AS chit_type, #{itpType} AS itp_type, #{acctCode} AS acct_code, #{vatYn} AS vat_yn, #{comId} AS com_id FROM dual ) src ON ( r.rule_id = src.rule_id AND r.com_id = src.com_id ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET r.chit_type = src.chit_type, r.itp_type = src.itp_type, r.acct_code = src.acct_code, r.vat_yn = src.vat_yn, r.update_date = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( rule_id, chit_type, itp_type, acct_code, vat_yn, com_id, created_date ) VALUES ( NVL(src.rule_id, (SELECT 'rule' || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(rule_id, 5))), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM auto_chit_rule WHERE com_id = src.com_id)), src.chit_type, src.itp_type, src.acct_code, src.vat_yn, src.com_id, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT 'rule' || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(rule_id, 5))), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM auto_chit_rule WHERE com_id = #{comId}
SELECT sub_code FROM subcodes WHERE sub_name = #{name} and main_code = 'cht'
SELECT sub_code FROM subcodes WHERE sub_name = #{name} and main_code = 'itp'
SELECT ACCT_CODE FROM account WHERE name = #{name}

SELECT chit_type, itp_type, acct_code, vat_yn, (SELECT name FROM account a WHERE a.acct_code = r.acct_code) AS aname, (SELECT sub_name FROM subcodes s WHERE s.sub_code = r.itp_type) AS iname FROM auto_chit_rule r WHERE chit_type = (SELECT sub_code FROM subcodes WHERE sub_name = #{chitType} AND main_code = 'cht') AND com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY itp_type ASC, acct_code DESC
